metadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.5.10+commit.5a6ea5b1"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[],"devdoc":{"methods":{"increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes8,bytes8)":{"details":"This sends us back to AWAITING_WITHDRAWAL_SIGNATURE","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer","_newOutputValueBytes":"The new output's value","_previousOutputValueBytes":"The previous output's value"},"return":"True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert"},"notifyRedemptionProofTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"This is considered fraud, and is punished","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer"}},"notifySignatureTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"details":"This is considered fraud, and is punished","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer"}},"provideRedemptionProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"The signers will be penalized if this is not called","params":{"_bitcoinHeaders":"An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers","_d":"deposit storage pointer","_merkleProof":"The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block","_txIndexInBlock":"The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed)","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txLocktime":"Final 4 bytes of the transaction","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs","_txVersion":"Transaction version number (4-byte LE)"}},"provideRedemptionSignature(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"The signers will be penalized if this (or provideRedemptionProof) is not called","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer","_r":"Signature R value","_s":"Signature S value","_v":"Signature recovery value"}},"redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes,bytes)":{"details":"We only look at the first input and first output. Revert if we find the wrong UTXO or value recipient.                         It's safe to look at only the first input/output as anything that breaks this can be considered fraud                         and can be caught by ECDSAFraudProof","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer","_txInputVector":"All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs","_txOutputVector":"All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs"},"return":"The value sent to the redeemer's public key hash"},"requestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes8,bytes20)":{"details":"The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer","_outputValueBytes":"The 8-byte LE output size","_redeemerPKH":"The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds"}},"transferAndRequestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes8,bytes20,address)":{"details":"The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx and pays for the redemption                             on behalf of _finalRecipient.","params":{"_d":"deposit storage pointer","_finalRecipient":"The address to receive the TDT and later be recorded as deposit redeemer.","_outputValueBytes":"The 8-byte LE output size","_redeemerPKH":"The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds"}}}},"userdoc":{"methods":{"increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes8,bytes8)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that a fee bump is needed"},"notifyRedemptionProofTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a redemption proof"},"notifySignatureTimeout(DepositUtils.Deposit storage)":{"notice":"Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a signature"},"provideRedemptionProof(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes4,bytes,bytes,bytes4,bytes,uint256,bytes)":{"notice":"Anyone may provide a withdrawal proof to prove redemption"},"provideRedemptionSignature(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,uint8,bytes32,bytes32)":{"notice":"Anyone may provide a withdrawal signature if it was requested"},"redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes,bytes)":{"notice":"Check the redemption transaction input and output vector to ensure the transaction spends                         the correct UTXO and sends value to the appropreate public key hash"},"requestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes8,bytes20)":{"notice":"Only TDT owner can request redemption,                              unless Deposit is expired or in COURTESY_CALL."},"transferAndRequestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit storage,bytes8,bytes20,address)":{"notice":"Anyone can request redemption as long as they can                             approve the TDT transfer to the final recipient."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/deposit/DepositRedemption.sol":"DepositRedemption"},"evmVersion":"petersburg","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/DepositLog.sol":{"keccak256":"0xb8626715991fb499bf4fc1bcfb5f2e067e028d3edc2f73aa2c574408b86093ae","urls":["bzzr://6444f4b04f44863465ee43dbc9a46291edcc58a3afdb3ffd645fb068f123974a","dweb:/ipfs/QmehKhQqLyAVNfzDhy3rbX96VAuK9m9aBwJUj5efosMcdD"]},"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/deposit/DepositLiquidation.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbf1ae7b1a1f0d6d6118d59e0226eebd548c291750d3cde4bb475959f159da8fe","urls":["bzzr://201f8b98a1814bee8f6535cebc11e524df75f22be1c777ed7d86d5c4d2b706a0","dweb:/ipfs/QmYj2VYemaMXVUVzGT1wasvi7Cxova5SvN17TjzHTMfRe8"]},"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/deposit/DepositRedemption.sol":{"keccak256":"0x13ad04b37342663d2434693da681717442e0a7e5704c1f041e7ddb3b95e6d191","urls":["bzzr://52737ce494252ff6a44fea1cc24d037990e2c5f10605a6e3440949bda9dea4ee","dweb:/ipfs/QmZ5R4o8fyeEfGqLfKYNSzjhvFYCfkgVEmEVCHwLf6b2Wj"]},"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/deposit/DepositStates.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbeea5c039fd45c8a21ae3955218510b8ab1c4cd3a3f72a342f3a595abf46e96b","urls":["bzzr://b3c128900d39699e61d3801cd95d63735c51bffb3b7759e403396495fbd1638d","dweb:/ipfs/QmaVLgGAtsyjkZENqU3aSZ4dxN1bXYqxKAeSfNhvTGQULQ"]},"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/deposit/DepositUtils.sol":{"keccak256":"0x16e3187942acfe957c64928cc50f0d1f505f4df3a836bab466c5b1f28a5b7fc1","urls":["bzzr://ee76f5c13eb6478747c65f6a85d59d75aa687372dd2811b326cb78a4120ed547","dweb:/ipfs/QmVum2ZmMEw4FFp16gQ4TgrKuHTGbfEJ1NGQ1cRZHbK9gt"]},"/tmp/4dc3a1f35eb2ac0746a4afda14417a7b0cb64f6d/implementation/contracts/deposit/OutsourceDeposit increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Depos.details: This sends us back to AWAITING_WITHDRAWAL_SIGNATURE
increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Depos.return: True if successful, False if prevented by timeout, otherwise revert

notifyRedemptionProofTimeout(DepositUtil.details: This is considered fraud, and is punished

notifySignatureTimeout(DepositUtils.Depo.details: This is considered fraud, and is punished

provideRedemptionProof(DepositUtils.Depo.details: The signers will be penalized if this is not called

params._bitcoinHeaders: An array of tightly-packed bitcoin headers
params._merkleProof: The merkle proof of inclusion of the tx in the bitcoin block
params._txIndexInBlock: The index of the tx in the Bitcoin block (0-indexed)
params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs

provideRedemptionSignature(DepositUtils..details: The signers will be penalized if this (or provideRedemptionProof) is not called

redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.details: We only look at the first input and first output. Revert if we find the wrong UTXO or value recipient.                         It's safe to look at only the first input/output as anything that breaks this can be considered fraud                         and can be caught by ECDSAFraudProof

params._txInputVector: All transaction inputs prepended by the number of inputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) inputs
params._txOutputVector: All transaction outputs prepended by the number of outputs encoded as a VarInt, max 0xFC(252) outputs

redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.return: The value sent to the redeemer's public key hash

requestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit s.details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx

params._redeemerPKH: The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds

transferAndRequestRedemption(DepositUtil.details: The redeemer specifies details about the Bitcoin redemption tx and pays for the redemption                             on behalf of _finalRecipient.

params._finalRecipient: The address to receive the TDT and later be recorded as deposit redeemer.
params._redeemerPKH: The 20-byte Bitcoin pubkeyhash to which to send funds

increaseRedemptionFee(DepositUtils.Depos.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that a fee bump is needed

notifyRedemptionProofTimeout(DepositUtil.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a redemption proof

notifySignatureTimeout(DepositUtils.Depo.notice: Anyone may notify the contract that the signers have failed to produce a signature

provideRedemptionProof(DepositUtils.Depo.notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal proof to prove redemption

provideRedemptionSignature(DepositUtils..notice: Anyone may provide a withdrawal signature if it was requested

redemptionTransactionChecks(DepositUtils.notice: Check the redemption transaction input and output vector to ensure the transaction spends                         the correct UTXO and sends value to the appropreate public key hash

requestRedemption(DepositUtils.Deposit s.notice: Only TDT owner can request redemption,                              unless Deposit is expired or in COURTESY_CALL.

transferAndRequestRedemption(DepositUtil.notice: Anyone can request redemption as long as they can                             approve the TDT transfer to the final recipient.
